Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- 2nd Justice Court
PW-Jeff. Sales Tax Dist. -- 1% S&U Tax - Parish Council
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Special Sales Tax)
 
Summary:  Authority for Jefferson Sales Tax District to expand the use of its one percent (1%) sales and use tax for the additional purposes of funding drainage projects in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Jefferson Sales Tax District (the "District"), under the provisions of Louisiana Revised Statutes 33:2721.4 and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to rededicate the proceeds of its one percent (1%) sales and use tax authorized, levied and collected, pursuant to special elections held in the District on June 9, 1984 and January 17, 1998 for the purposes of funding (a) the purchase, construction, acquisition and improvement of sewerage projects and the cost of maintenance and replacement of sewerage facilities, (b) the construction, improvement or maintenance of public roads, streets or highways located in Jefferson Parish, including the cost or reconstruction, rehabilitation, base stabilization, drainage, adjustments and related sidewalks and curbs, and (c) the construction of gravity and/or forced drainage facilities, including drains, drainage lines, drainage canals, ditches, pumps and pumping stations, including replacement and upgrading of aged pumping equipment and machinery, dikes and other related works, cutting and opening new drains, drainage lines, ditches and canals, and the acquisition of lands for necessary public drainage purposes, including rights of way; provided further that the proceeds of the aforesaid tax may be funded into bonds for any of the capital purposes for which the proceeds of said tax are authorized to be funded in the manner permitted by the laws of Louisiana, including Subpart, Part III, Chapter 4 of Title 39 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended?
